ai-patthana8.49:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.49:1.1_0: Corrupt gives rise to corruptions. Sentient beings doesn’t give rise to sorrow.
ai-patthana8.49:1.1_1: No corruption of the teaching arises dependent on the cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.49:2.1_0: No cause is a reason why the gift to attributes is not the cause.
ai-patthana8.49:4.1_0: (These nine discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
